name: PhishBaitAI
description: PhishBait AI project is a toolkit designed to provide users with a first line of defense against online social engineering (Phishing). As attempts to deceive computer users increase in sophistication, it is becoming harder to determine what types of digital communication are authentic.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://mail.google.com/* https://mail.protonmail.com/* https://mail.zoho.com/* https://mail.aol.com/* https://navigator-lxa.mail.com/* https://mail.yahoo.com/* https://outlook.office365.com/* https://outlook.office.com/* https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com; object-src
